name: Box Blast (MysteriousDeveloper)
description:
Welcome to Box Blast, a fast-paced top-down shooter!

Move around with WASD, Shoot with Left Click, and throw grenades with G!

Pause the game with SPACE or P!

Increase your score to unprecedented amounts via a combo system!

Kill the boxes chasing you, and get as high a score as possible, but beware - you may be what causes a game over!

Music by the Classified Composer.

Font by codeman38.

Enjoyed this very much? Consider supporting me on Patreon.

For games of a similar kind, check out Fun1, Fun2, Zombie Click, Boomerang Bloodlust, PolyCombat or Bunker Buster!
